amendment.description: Amendment increases the Department of Housing and Urban Development Brownfields Redevelopment Program account by $15 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Community Development Fund by $15,000,000.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Miller, Gary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, Gary amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 286 - 139 (Roll no. 266).
